summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept.; authorizing the Mayor to execute a grant agreement with the Dept. of Ecology for the Pipers Creek Watershed Nonpoint Pollution Action Plan; authorizing the acceptance of grant money to be received; authorizing the hiring of consultants; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1987 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Dept.; and making partially reimbursable appropriations from the Engineering Dept. Operating and Sewer Funds therefor.
